titles.title: Here We Are, In Your Presence

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Here we are, in Your presence,
Lifting holy hands to You.
Here we are, praising Jesus,
*For the things He's brought us through.
*For the things He's brought us to.
*For the things He's called us to.
*For the grace He's wrought in you.
*For the love He's brought us to.
